title: kog'maw eyes
body: hi, im not 100% sure this is a bug, but i noticed when i zoom in on butterfly kog'maw, his eyes always follow a pattern movement (i think it's down then inwards, but its not relevent) and after it completes the pattern his eyes seem to roll backwards into his head and disappear then reappear and the pattern starts over. I don't think they are supposed to disappear.

replies.body:
thats what i thought originally, but his eye lashes don't move...
of course i dont expect it to be perfect, but i just thought i would say something :)
much weed was smoked to notice this senpai
